title: Fonts like Bantjes' Restraint
content: Can anyone recommend fonts that are similar to Marian Bantjes' Restraint? In other words, fonts with characters that lock together and build pretty ornamental patterns and borders? Thanks!
author: d_r_f

comments.content: Why not use Restraint? Or, was your question “Is there a free font…?”

I can only think of these two:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jhische/snowflake/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140721195750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/jhische/snowflake/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/jhische/snowflake/")  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/brownstone-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140721195750/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/brownstone-sans/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/brownstone-sans/")

These both make borders and lock together (Brownstone has a pile of ligatures). However, they aren't like Restraint at all!
They don't have to be free—I'm just looking for some alternatives that don't feel quite so "Marian Bantjes" but have a relatively similar effect.
